name: Frayed (LilyDynamite)
description:
Explore the unique nation of Beacon with an unlikely ally on a quest to secure glory and prosperity for your home. In this adorable moth-themed platformer,  you will encounter a variety of enemies, areas, and bosses.  Engaging gameplay will keep you immersed, and the play time is not too long where you will become bored.

This is my first published game, I hope you enjoy!
